text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Nitro 5 Laptop: Core i5-8300H, 8GB RAM, 1 TB HDD, 15.6" Full HD Display, NVidia GTX 1050!

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the port selection on the Acer Nitro 5 Laptop: Core i5-8300H, 8GB RAM, 1 TB HDD, 15.6" Full HD Display, NVidia GTX 1050. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Nitro 5 Laptop: Core i5-8300H, 8GB RAM, 1 TB HDD, 15.6" Full HD Display, NVidia GTX 1050!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Acer Nitro 5 Laptop: Core i5-8300H, 8GB RAM, 1 TB HDD, 15.6" Full HD Display, NVidia GTX 1050 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Nitro 5 Laptop: Core i5-8300H, 8GB RAM, 1 TB HDD, 15.6" Full HD Display, NVidia GTX 1050!
